channel.title: increpare games
channel.description: a feed of games and other things made by increpare
channel.author: Stephen Lavelle

item.title: Adventures in a Foreign Land
item.description: this constitutes my swing at the rpgdx.net 48 hour rpg competition.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Lavelle

item.title: Mirror Stage
item.description: In which I break my rule of thumb not to post more than once about any game.

item.title: Signifier
item.description: A necessary release of the stipple-ache that someone else's work induced in me.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Lavelle

item.title: Opera Omnia
item.description: a Complicated Interface Game; play at your peril.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Lavelle

item.title: Kiss Me
item.description: All of the sexually explicit content sort of mysteriously never materialized over the course of the game development.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Lavelle

item.title: The Black Yeti
item.description: It was a nice break from the main project I'm working on, which should be finished within the next fortnight.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Lavelle

item.title: Transplatform
item.description: I did not have the motivation to polish it up; it be pretty shit as games go, and I wanted to move on to something more interesting.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Lavelle

item.title: The Lua Puppet
item.description: deeply sorry about the lackof mac/binary versions, really

item.title: Kristallnacht
item.description: Screenshot is of older version. This version has no numbers, promise.

item.title: Burn
item.description: The title, and the compo themes might provide clues. This is a puzzle.

item.title: Infidelidad
item.description: I am reasonably happy with this, short as it is. My first foray into '3D', so...

item.title: The Hero Saved Me
item.description: Rough around the edges, but it be okay for What It Is, I think.

item.title: lacrimosa
item.description: not exactly happy with it, but I doubt that I will loose any sleep over putting it out in the wild either.

item.title: Rara Racer
item.description: I regret not having a simultaneous osx build, but time constraints did not allow for such indulgences ...
